first_para: Richard "Dick" Cole (born 6 April 1968) is an elected member of Cornwall Council and the leader of the Cornish devolutionist political party, Mebyon Kernow, a role he has held since 1997. He lives in Fraddon, a village in Mid-Cornwall.

full.extract: Richard "Dick" Cole (born 6 April 1968) is an elected member of Cornwall Council and the leader of the Cornish devolutionist political party, Mebyon Kernow, a role he has held since 1997. He lives in Fraddon, a village in Mid-Cornwall.
full.title: Dick Cole (politician)
